headline: Show HN: No-code data analysis
description:
Hey HN!

I built Shape recently and would love to hear your thoughts. A lot of jobs now require making decisions with data in a database or warehouse. Unfortunately, most people don't know SQL.

Shape plugs directly into a database or warehouse and allows you to do (almost anything) that SQL could do, but without code. There's a quick 2-min demo here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r_Hq1hm-8bI

If you want to take it for a spin, you can log in in one-click and use our demo database to try it out. Excited to hear what you all think!
